caption:
A recent community survey revealed the majority of connectRN clinicians responding are either currently in school, or thinking about going back in the near future. 

More nurses are going back to school than ever before to increase their earning potential and keep up with the pace of change in healthcare. 

If you’re currently in nursing school, or thinking about going back, here are 4 tips to consider that can help you maintain flexibility and a true work-school-life balance.

Are you currently pursuing another nursing certification or degree? 

Tell us in the comments below.
